architectural_notes: Deployment domain/slug must be 5â€“50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
known_issues: Deployment did not generate a share link due to invalid domain/slug input failing validation.

existing_features.title: Add a new initial "Warning" screen that displays the text "Open this link at your own risk" and requires the user to click a "Continue" button before entering the existing app flow (404 -> invitation -> celebration).

Implement a shareable URL format that includes an explicit link segment/fragment (e.g., a hash fragment) to open the app directly in the Warning screen, and display this full share URL in the UI with a copy-to-clipboard action.
Keep all user-facing text on the new Warning/share UI in English and align styling with the existing soft pastel aesthetic (card container, rounded edges, subtle shadows, smooth transitions).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a shareable link/page that displays a warning message (e.g., 'Open this link at your own risk') before continuing
Allow customizing the deployment domain/slug while enforcing valid characters (letters/numbers/hyphens) and length constraints

projectName: Add shareable warning-gate link and copyable URL
